需VPN，否则需用镜像替换搜索URL而避免使用VPN
搜索关键字支持“书名#作者”格式而不支持“#作者”重定向格式

ruleBookInfo.author:
@css::has(>:matchesOwn(作 *者([:： 　]|$))):not(:matches([|。《]|[\s\S]{50,}),:has(>:matchesOwn(^(全本|书库|排行|首页)$)))@text||#author@text||.author@text
@js:if(result.length)result.replace(/(更新数|[更最]新章节|最[后新]更新|更新时间)[ 　:：]?|([^ ] *[^ 更0-9]|更)[:：]/g,"\n$1$2:").replace(/[^☯]*?作 *者[:： 　]*/,"").replace(/\s[\s\S]*/,"")
ruleBookInfo.kind:
@css::has(>:matchesOwn([分类大] *[类型别]([:： 　]|$))):not(:matches([|。《]|[\s\S]{50,}),:has(>:matchesOwn(^(大小|全本|书库|排行|首页)$)))@text
@js:if(result.length)result.replace(/(更新数|[更最]新章节|最[后新]更新|更新时间)[ 　:：]?|([^ ] *[^ 更0-9]|更)[:：]/g,"\n$1$2:").replace(/[^☯]*?[分类大] *[类型别][>:： 　]*/,"").replace(/\s[\s\S]*/,"")

ruleContent.nextContentUrl: a:matches(第二[頁页]|下[一\s]*[頁節話页篇节章回话]):not([href~=/$|:])@href

ruleSearch.author: @js:java.get("au")
ruleSearch.wordCount:
div.osl a:eq(0)@text
##^(\d+[.、] *|第 *[一二三四五六七八九十百千万〇零0-9]+ *章 *|\[[0-9]+\] *)+(?=第? *[一二三四五六七八九十百千万〇零0-9]+ *[章节回话卷])

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {

  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  wordCount: J.select('#count span').eq(1).text(),
  intro: J.select('#bookintro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var toc = J.select('#chapterList a')
  .toArray()
  .map(function (el) {
    return {
      text: el.text(),
      href: el.attr('href'),
    };
  });

var latestChapterUrl = J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_url]').attr(
  'content'
);

if (!String(latestChapterUrl).includes(toc[toc.length - 1].url)) {
  toc.push({
    text: J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_name]').attr('content'),
    href: latestChapterUrl,
  });
}

toc;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: o('#count li:eq(1) span').replace(/\s+/,''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookintro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
发现：全网排行
搜索：全网搜书
原网：直达原网

搜索关键字
──────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
简化格式4(夸克官方数据)：#作者
──────
目录排序：网站章节目录错乱的小说网站质量很差，对这种网站的小说目录重新排序浪费时间不值得，故夸克原网不对目录进行排序，如果想对目录排序请使用“夸克电脑”，夸克电脑对章节进行了重新排序

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:lastest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

JSON.parse(result).data.list.map(o=>{
    var bid = o.id;
    var option = JSON.stringify({'method':'POST','body':'_time=1568281576&_access_token=70c65dcbebf421dbab82e3af6521a051&bookId=' + bid});
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://app.quyuedu.hzquyue.com/v2/book.html,'+ option)).data;
    return {
       name:  o.title,
       author:o.nickname,
       tags:  J.category,
       num: J.char_num+'字',
       latest: '第' + J.last_chapter.chapter_num + '章 ' + J.last_chapter.title+String(java.timeFormat(Number(J.last_update_time)*1000)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
       intro: o.introduction,
       cover: o.front_cover.replace(/_.*/,'_96x137'),
       catalogUrl: '/book/chapterList.html,'+ option
    }
});
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
JSON.parse(result).data.slice(0,3).map(o=>{
    var option = JSON.stringify({"method": "POST","body": "action=book&id="+o.articleid});
    var detail = baseUrl+','+option;
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax(detail)).data.info;
    return {
      name:o.articlename,
      author:o.author,
      tags:o.catename,
      num:o.size+'字',
      latest:String(J.lastchapter).replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*[】）\)]/,'')+String(o.update_time).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
      intro:o.intro,
      cover:o.images,
      name:o.articlename,
      catalogUrl: 'https://m.wanbentxt.com/'+o.articleid+'/all.html'
   }
});
</js>

<js>
id=result.match(/article_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
cid=result.match(/chapter_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
hash=result.match(/hash = "([\d\w]+)"/)[1];

result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(tmp)).info.content

(()=>{
	var ua = "navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(); 			return { 				'mobile': !!(ua.match(/applewebkit.*mobile.*/) || ua.match(/iemobile/) || ua.match(/windows phone/) || ua.match(/android/) || ua.match(/iphone/) || ua.match(/ipad/)), 				'weixin': ua.indexOf('micromessenger') > -1 			};";
	var heders = {"User-Agent": ua};
	return JSON.stringify(heders);
})()
</js>

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: parseInt( o('.booktag span:eq(2)').replace('字数：','')/10000) + '万',
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookIntro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro p:eq(1)').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: baseUrl,
};
book;
